poc.question: How is PoC (Proof of Concept) carried out?

answer.intro: PoC is carried out in the following 5 stages:
steps: Hearing - Detailed investigation of issues and requirements (1-2 weeks)
PoC Proposal - Optimal solution proposal (1 week)
Effect Verification - ROI and effect measurement (2-4 weeks)
Main Development - Full-scale system construction (3-12 months)
answer.conclusion: Since we confirm the effects at each stage before proceeding to the next, we can minimize risks.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: IoTRealm's Privacy Policy. We explain how we handle your personal information.
privacy.intro: Cor Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "the Company") recognizes the protection of customer personal information as an important responsibility in providing the AI/IoT solution "IoTRealm" and will handle it appropriately according to the following privacy policy.

section1.title: 1. Definition of Personal Information
section1.content: In this privacy policy, "personal information" refers to personal information as defined by the Personal Information Protection Law, meaning information about a living individual that can identify a specific individual, such as name, date of birth, address, telephone number, email address, etc.

section2.title: 2. Collection of Personal Information
section2.intro: The Company may collect personal information in the following cases.
cases: When contacting us via inquiry form
When making a reservation for a free consultation
When requesting a PoC (Proof of Concept)

section3.title: 3. Data Collection by IoT Devices
section3.intro: In our IoT solutions, we may collect the following types of data.
dataTypes: Sensor data (temperature, humidity, vibration, acoustic, etc.)
Location data (GPS coordinates, movement history, etc.)
Image data (surveillance cameras, inspection cameras, etc.)
Audio data (voice recognition, acoustic analysis, etc.)

section4.title: 4. Purpose of Personal Information Use
section4.intro: The Company uses collected personal information for the following purposes.
purposes: Service improvement and new feature development

section5.title: 5. Third-Party Provision of Personal Information
section5.content:
The Company will not provide personal information to third parties without customer consent, except as required by law. However, this does not apply in the following cases.

1. When required by law
2. When necessary to protect human life, body, or property
3. When particularly necessary for improving public health or promoting healthy child development
4. When cooperation is necessary for national institutions, local governments, or their commissioned parties to perform duties prescribed by law

section6.title: 6. Personal Information Security Management
section6.content: The Company takes appropriate security management measures to prevent loss, destruction, falsification, and leakage of personal information. Specifically, we implement access control, encryption, regular security audits, etc., and strive to protect personal information.

section7.title: 7. Rights Regarding Personal Information
section7.intro: Customers have the following rights regarding their own personal information held by the Company.
rights: Request for disclosure of personal information
Request for correction, addition, or deletion of personal information
Request for suspension or deletion of personal information use
Request for suspension of third-party provision of personal information

section8.title: 8. Contact Information
section8.content:
For inquiries regarding personal information handling, please contact us at the following.

Cor Co., Ltd.
IoTRealm Privacy Officer
Email: privacy@cor-jo.com
Contact Form: https://cor-jp.com/contact/

section9.title: 9. Privacy Policy Changes
section9.content: The Company may change this privacy policy due to changes in laws or business content. When changes are made, we will announce them on our website.
